entry.title: LibGD 2.2.1 release
entry.summary:
Hot on the tail of the 2.2.0 release, we've got 2.2.1 ready! A security issue was missed in the previous bug triaging but that's in here now.

This is a recommended update.

You can download the 2.2.1 version of GD Graphics Library from the …
entry.content:
Hot on the tail of the 2.2.0 release, we've got 2.2.1 ready! A security issue was missed in the previous bug triaging but that's in here now.

This is a recommended update.

You can download the 2.2.1 version of GD Graphics Library from the libgd project.

Check out the full commits list since the previous release.

entry.title: LibGD 2.2.0 release
entry.summary: GD team proudly announces that the 2.2.0 version of GD Graphics Library has been released. We have fixed a good number of reported bugs. The cmake build is getting better, but most people should still use the configure script. See the Changelog files for a full list with …
entry.content:
GD team proudly announces that the 2.2.0 version of GD Graphics Library has been released. We have fixed a good number of reported bugs. The cmake build is getting better, but most people should still use the configure script. See the Changelog files for a full list with details or CVEs.

This is a recommended update.

You can download the 2.2.0 version of GD Graphics Library from the libgd project.

Check out the full commits list since the previous release.
